Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory196.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "Just so you know, this wasn't my plan.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'I never signed up for this... annoying group activity.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You follow the youngsters' gaze and see a bunch of kids crowding around you on the slide; some are clustered around Camu, while others are shouting and darting around the playground."}
{1: '1', 2: '"Forsaken Leader"', 3: 'Please give orders to launch an attack on Babylonia!', 4: '2'}
{3: "A burly-looking kid grabs Camu's shirt. Then another kid spots you and yells out."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Hey, that person looks just like our commandant! Are you here to help?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The kid playing "Hassen" finally catches on.'}
{3: 'The kids playing Forsaken and Babylonia split into two teams, with the "Babylonia" being the slide platform they were storming.'}
{2: 'What on earth is this chaos...', 3: '19'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'How would I know why they suddenly swarmed this place, or why you showed up out of the blue!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "But listen, you lot, this person's the real deal! This is the Gray Raven Commandant from Babylonia!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The kids, kind of getting it, gasp in awe.'}
{3: "Camu's words have a bigger impact than expected."}
{1: '1', 2: '"Forsaken Leader"', 3: "Babylonia's on the attack! Fight back!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Protect our commandant! Everyone, to arms!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The "Babylonia Troops"" charge down the slide, while the ""Forsaken" have already formed a circle on the other side. Soon, the kids are in a frenzy.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Nicely done, soldiers, keep it up! Beat them back!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hang on! The commandant wants to negotiate!', 3: '38'}
{3: "You manage to draw the kids' attention."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "We could've been comrades in battle!", 4: '1'}
{2: '"Forsaken Leader"', 3: "I'm willing, but on one condition: my buddies need treatment.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The two kids hash it out, exchange glances, then turn away, slightly miffed.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Okay, okay, we agree! Can we call a truce now?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's shake on it.", 3: '49'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kids', 3: 'Yay! Thanks a bunch, Master Camu! And you too, Commandant!', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'They walk over to each other and solemnly shake hands.'}
{2: 'Kids', 3: 'Master and Commandant should shake hands too!', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "We weren't even fighting!", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's shake on it together.", 3: '61'}
{3: 'Camu hesitates but finally reaches out his hand.'}
{2: "(Hold Camu's hand)", 3: '65'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Is this... all right then?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'We can keep shaking hands.', 3: '67', 4: "You're having fun with this, huh?", 5: '68'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Fine, but I didn't come here to play with these brats.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I didn't come here to play with these brats.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Must be something else then?', 3: '70'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'I suppose so.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu takes out a bracelet made of stones. They are all bright and colorful, despite their uneven shapes, clearly handpicked with care.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'This is for you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, he takes hold of your hand, undoing the bracelet and slipping it onto your wrist.'}
{2: 'Is this... specially prepared for today?', 3: '75'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'What else?', 4: '1'}
